attributes.action: Step down and take his sorry excuse for a Party with him.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax Hikes, Criminals being let out of jail, wars we can't afford, Lies, nanny state, the NHS, massive pay rises for ministers, Expenses beyond what most people earn, Lies, and not even being voted in. Where will it end. Step down now or there will be a revolution!
The people undersigned want you to resign

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
